member.summary: Loads the cache objects that are most likely required for basic functionality. The rest of the cache will be hydrated on a background task.

member.summary: Adds/Updates any attributes that were defined in web.config 's rockConfig section This is usually used for Plugin Components that need to get any changed values from web.config before startup

member.summary: Sends a message to Spark with version info, etc If any exceptions occur, they will be logged and ignored

member.name: M:Rock.WebStartup.RockApplicationStartupHelper.InitializeLava
member.summary: Initializes Rock's Lava system (which uses DotLiquid) Doing this in startup will force the static Liquid class to get instantiated so that the standard filters are loaded prior to the custom RockFilter. This is to allow the custom 'Date' filter to replace the standard Date filter.

member.name: M:Rock.WebStartup.RockApplicationStartupHelper.InitializeLavaSafeTypes(Rock.Lava.ILavaEngine)
member.summary: Initializes the lava safe types on the engine. This takes care of special types that we don't have direct access to so we can't add the proper interfaces to them.

member.summary: Initialize the job scheduler.
